articles.content: On October 21, Kotak Mahindra Bank (KMB) announced that the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has approved the appointment of Ashok Vaswani as the banks next managing director and chief executive officer.… [+11032 chars]

articles.title: HDFC Bank slips 2%; stock weak for third straight day, nearing 52-week low - Business Standard
articles.description: In Q2, HDFC Bank's NIMs were under pressure, primarily because of the excess liquidity on the books.
articles.content:
